av4e013.1 Team Up: Dr. Strange
Rarity: Rare
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Special Powers
TEAM UP: DR. STRANGE: If Wong and the listed friendly character are on the map, they both can use Mastermind but only to choose friendly characters with the Mystical keyword.
Trade Team Up: Dr. Strange Want Team Up: Dr. Strange

December 17, 2022
tidge
I rather like this Team Up. The base (Av4e 013) Wong is pretty much a "manservant" interpretation of the character, but playing this Wong with (any) "Dr. Strange" on a Mystical keyword team isn't a bad way to play a thematic that wouldn't be obviously 'borken', but with Wong using his DIMENSIONAL GATEWAY power to be placed such that he can make an attack of his own... or simply use Force Blast, or Support. The Mastermind on Wong (and his Dr. Strange buddy) can be leveraged to improve the play of the force build. We are also in an era with some reasonably costed characters named "Dr. Strange" that also carry their own weight, so a standard team build can have 200+ build points if using this Wong and a qualifying Dr. Strange.
